Class Hand

  • java.lang.Object
    • Hand

  • public class Hand
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Hand()
      Constructor for hand that sets all starter values to 0.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCard(card toSet)
      Adds card to hand if space is available and is a valid card and adjusts total hand value accordingly.
      static boolean blackJack(card[] hand)
      Checks if there are only two valid cards in the hand that have a value of 21.
      static int calculateHandValue(card[] hand)
      Calculate hand based off of the given card array
      void emptyHand()
      Empties hand by zeroing all variables, and places "null" cards into every slot of card array.
      void flipCard()
      Flips all invisible cards to visible.
      card[] getHand() 
      int getHandValue()
      Calculates and gets totalHandValue.
      int getNumberOfCards() 
      static boolean isValidCard(card testCard)
      Checks if a valid poker card, based off of suite
      static void printCard(card obj)
      Prints card from parameter, regardless if visible or not.

      • Hand

        public Hand()
        Constructor for hand that sets all starter values to 0.

    • Method Detail

      • emptyHand

        public void emptyHand()
        Empties hand by zeroing all variables, and places "null" cards into every slot of card array.

      • addCard

        public void addCard(card toSet)
        Adds card to hand if space is available and is a valid card and adjusts total hand value accordingly.
        Parameters:
        card - object to add to hand.

      • flipCard

        public void flipCard()
        Flips all invisible cards to visible.

      • getNumberOfCards

        public int getNumberOfCards()
        Returns:
        the number of cards in hand.

      • getHand

        public card[] getHand()
        Returns:
        returns card array that represents hand

      • getHandValue

        public int getHandValue()
        Calculates and gets totalHandValue.
        Returns:
        hand value according to blackjack rules.

      • blackJack

        public static boolean blackJack(card[] hand)
        Checks if there are only two valid cards in the hand that have a value of 21.
        Parameters:
        hand - representing a card array to check.
        Returns:
        true if the value was an Ace and a ten point card.

      • isValidCard

        public static boolean isValidCard(card testCard)
        Checks if a valid poker card, based off of suite
        Parameters:
        testCard - to test if it is a valid poker card.
        Returns:
        true if it is a valid poker card, and false if invalid.

      • printCard

        public static void printCard(card obj)
        Prints card from parameter, regardless if visible or not.
        Parameters:
        card - object to print it's values.

      • calculateHandValue

        public static int calculateHandValue(card[] hand)
        Calculate hand based off of the given card array
        Parameters:
        card - array to calculate hand value
        Returns:
        total hand value
